text: VC Dynamo Moscow () is a Russian professional men's volleyball team based in Moscow which is playing in the Super League. Dynamo Moscow won the title of Russian Championionship twice (2006, 2008). The club won a silver and two bronze medals at the CEV Champions League. ==Achievements== *CEV Champions League ::Runners-up (1): 2010 ::Third place (1): 2011 *CEV Cup Winners' Cup / CEV Cup ::Winners (3): 1985, 2012, 2015 ::Third place (1): 1990, 1993 *USSR/Russian Championship ::Winners (7): 1945, 1946, 1947, 1948, 1951, 2006, 2008 ::Runners-up (14): 1950, 1952, 1953, 1958, 1984, 1985, 1988, 1989, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2011, 2012, 2016 ::Third place (10): 1949, 1965, 1980, 1983, 1986, 1992, 1993, 2002, 2010, 2015 *Russian Cup ::Winners (5): 1950, 1951, 1952, 2006, 2008 *Russian SuperCup
